participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ethan is easygoing and adventurous. He enjoys the tranquility of the countryside and often seeks thrills through horse riding.
participant_1.background: i help tend the fields. i've three arabian horses. i like to listen to rock music while working. i like to ride horses.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Maya is nurturing and hardworking. She has a deep appreciation for nature and finds joy in both music and the bond with her horses.
participant_2.background: i help tend the fields. i like to listen to rock music while working. i like to ride horses. i have three arabian horses. my father is a farmer.
